page.title: 15Peddling pensioners.
page.content: Mr.'Bert'Barnes and Mrs.'Queenie' Barnes live on Folgate Lane, Walpole St. Peter.Both are over 70 years of age but think nothing of cycling ten or twenty miles in the course of a day.They have,however,become known nationally becuse of this exploits when cycling abroad.Some two years ago thay cycled from coast to coast across CANADA and have spent their time since cycling to meetings where they have shown their slides and talk about their experiences.although in the process of planning a summer cycling vacation to Wales,their next ambition is to cycle coast to coast across AUSTRALIA.This they hope to do in 1987.They make the interesting comment that they feel safer cycling in towns and cities rather than along country lanes.
